trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Monona
There was one other sighting in Monona on or around August 16th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was entering a Monona Grove High School football game, the season opener, i happened to look up at the sky. i saw a strange object that looked a lot like a shooting star but could not have been one. lucky for me a few days earlier i had been camping outside of madison. i was watching the monthly shooting star thing that happens well every month. I saw lots of shooting stars and they were fresh in my mind. many were hard to see and if there is much light almost imposible. i cannot verify at the moment what direction it started from but moved from right to left. it moved just like a shooting star. to be honest it could have been a shooting star, but in my mind after what i say just days earlier it seems very unlikely.
Summary: UFO that looks like shooting star darts through lit up sky at hs football game
